org.xchain.impl

Class FilterList

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList<Command>
          • org.xchain.impl.FilterList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<Command>, java.util.Collection<Command>, java.util.List<Command>, java.util.RandomAccess, Command, Filter

    public class FilterList
extends java.util.ArrayList<Command>
implements Filter, Command
    Almost an exact port of the class org.apache.commons.chain.impl.ChainBase, except the nested chains are represented with a java.util.ArrayList instead of an array.
    Author:
    Craig R. McClanahan, Christian Trimble
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • postProcess

        public boolean postProcess(org.apache.commons.jxpath.JXPathContext context,
                  java.lang.Exception exception)
        Description copied from interface: Filter
        Invoked after the parent command has completed execution or an exception is encountered.
        Specified by:
        postProcess in interface Filter
        Parameters:
        context - The current context for the command chain.
        exception - The exception the parent command encountered. Null if no exception was encountered.
        Returns:
        Whether the given exception was handled. If no exception was encountered, the result is ignored.
